name: Post-sql
value:
unload ('select * from cdp_dwh.tables_to_be_dropped') 
to 's3://intl-andesmcm-digital-eco-data-platform-dlake-tier2-prod/sandbox_unused/tables_to_be_dropped' 
iam_role 'arn:aws:iam::281540749950:role/intl-andesmcm-digital-eco-dataplatform-redshiftrole-prod' 
DELIMITER AS '|' PARALLEL OFF ALLOWOVERWRITE NULL AS '\0';
